          <h2>
           Need help with your research?
          </h2>
         </div>

     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox22022587">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="22022587">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title22022587">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           How do I obtain primary sources on Cold War America?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content22022587">
          <div id="boxatt22022587" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link25490963">
              <a id="link_25490963" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=a9h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25490963,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Cold War America', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12343584}); ">
               Academic Search Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Includes primary documents from magazines back to the twenties.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25482540">
              <a id="link_25482540" href="https://www.mtholyoke.edu/acad/intrel/coldwar.htm" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25482540,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Cold War America', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25482540}); ">
               Documents Relating to American Foreign Policy: The Cold War
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Gateway to documents, arranged chronologically. Site hosted by Mount Holyoke College.
               <br />
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25482086">
              <a id="link_25482086" href="http://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25482086,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Cold War America', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508793}); ">
               Encompass Search
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Encompass Search searches for books and other resources, first in our own library, and then beyond, in other research libraries.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25492042">
              Film Review Index
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Index to film reviews from 1882-1985. Call #016.79143 F487r
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25488611">
              <a id="link_25488611" href="http://books.google.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25488611,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Cold War America', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508825}); ">
               Google Books
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Google Books is a rich source of full-text documents (books and other materials) published prior to 1923 that are now in the public domain.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25488283">
              <a id="link_25488283" href="http://search.proquest.com.muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/publication/45545" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25488283,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Cold War America', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24889045}); ">
               New York Times Archive 1923-2012 via Proquest
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25488575">
              Public Papers of the Presidents
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Located on level A, Government Documents, Call#AE2.114
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25488286">
              <a id="link_25488286" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=rgr" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25488286,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Cold War America', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12344565}); ">
               Reader's Guide Retrospective
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Provides indexing of general-interest periodicals published in the United States for the period 1890-1982.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25488285">
              <a id="link_25488285" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://find.galegroup.com/ttda/start.do?userGroupName=mul_coll" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25488285,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Cold War America', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12344567}); ">
               Times Digital Archive
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Since its first publication in 1785, The Times (London) has become one of the most preeminent, global daily (except Sundays) newspapers of the 18th- through early 21st-centuries centuries, covering international events, people, places, politics, business news, opinion and debate, entertainment and advertising. The Times Digital Archive makes this highly regarded resource available in an easy-to-navigate, fully-searchable online resource containing every page of every issue within the range of years displayed in the product banner.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25488795">
              United States Government Publications Monthly Catalog
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Location: End of government documents on level A of the library.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25482094">
              <a id="link_25482094" href="http://digitalarchive.wilsoncenter.org/theme/cold-war-history" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25482094,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Cold War America', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25482094}); ">
               Wilson Center Digital Archive: Cold War History
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Since its establishment in August 1991, the Cold War International History Project (CWIHP) has amassed a tremendous collection of archival documents on the Cold War era from the once secret archives of former communist countries. CWIHP has become internationally recognized as the world’s preeminent resource on the Cold War.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25492724">
              <a id="link_25492724" href="http://millercenter.org/academic/presidentialstudies" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25492724,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Cold War America', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25492724}); ">
               Presidential Studies at the Miller Center of Public Affairs
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Presidential papers back to Washington.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox22022588">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="22022588">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title22022588">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           What about journals, reference works, and books that may contain, or reference, primary sources?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content22022588">
          <div id="boxatt22022588" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link25482072">
              <a id="link_25482072" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.aspx?authtype=ip,uid&amp;profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=31h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25482072,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Cold War America', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12329245}); ">
               America: History &amp; Life with Full Text
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A subscription database. Standard index for American history. Some full text. Also links to full text in other databases.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25482073">
              <a id="link_25482073" href="http://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25482073,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Cold War America', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508793}); ">
               Encompass Search
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Encompass Search searches for books and other resources, first in our own library, and then beyond, in other research libraries.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25482075">
              <a id="link_25482075" href="http://books.google.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25482075,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Cold War America', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508825}); ">
               Google Books
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Google Books is a rich source of full-text documents (books and other materials) published prior to 1923 that are now in the public domain.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25488267">
              <a id="link_25488267" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=web&amp;defaultdb=mzh" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25488267,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Cold War America', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12717120}); ">
               MLA International Bibliography
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Premier scholarly index, with numerous links to full text, to criticism in the areas of literature, language, linguistics, film studies, and folklore, published from 1920-present.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25488782">
              <a id="link_25488782" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Main_Page" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25488782,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Cold War America', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24940522}); ">
               Wikipedia
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Useful in particular for the reference lists that accompany many of the entries: popular and sometimes scholarly sources.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25488871">
              <a id="link_25488871" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://newfirstsearch.oclc.org/done=http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu//;dbname=worldcat;fsip" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25488871,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Cold War America', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12344495}); ">
               WorldCat
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Search catalogs from libraries across the country and around the globe.  Items owned by Trexler Library show a Muhlenberg College Library icon.  Request items not owned by Trexler Library directly through WorldCat using the ILL (Interlibrary Loan) button. Items generally take 2-10 days to arrive.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox22023026">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="22023026">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title22023026">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           How about secondary sources for historiography?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content22023026">
          <div id="boxatt22023026" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link25482569">
              <a id="link_25482569" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.aspx?authtype=ip,uid&amp;profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=31h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25482569,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Cold War America', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12329245}); ">
               America: History &amp; Life with Full Text
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               The definitive database of literature covering the history and culture of the United States and Canada, from prehistory to the present. With selective indexing for 1,700 journals from 1964 to present, this database is without question the most important bibliographic reference tool for students and scholars of U.S. and Canadian history. Full text journals include American Historical Review, American 19th Century History, American Studies, Early American Studies, Journal of American Culture, Journal of American History, Journal of Early American History, and Journal of Military History.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25482570">
              <a id="link_25482570" href="http://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25482570,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Cold War America', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508793}); ">
               Encompass Search
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Encompass Search searches for books and other resources, first in our own library, and then beyond, in other research libraries.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25483008">
              <a id="link_25483008" href="http://scholar.google.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25483008,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Cold War America', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19855349}); ">
               Google Scholar
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Free search engine for books and journal articles in all disciplines.Links may take you to free full text, or search the library's site for full text access.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25483005">
              <a id="link_25483005" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=web&amp;defaultdb=mzh" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25483005,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Cold War America', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12766286}); ">
               MLA International Bibliography
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Premier scholarly index, with numerous links to full text, to criticism in the areas of literature, language, linguistics, film studies, and folklore, published from 1920-present.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25488870">
              <a id="link_25488870" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://newfirstsearch.oclc.org/done=http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu//;dbname=worldcat;fsip" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25488870,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Cold War America', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12344495}); ">
               WorldCat
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Search catalogs from libraries across the country and around the globe.  Items owned by Trexler Library show a Muhlenberg College Library icon.  Request items not owned by Trexler Library directly through WorldCat using the ILL (Interlibrary Loan) button. Items generally take 2-10 days to arrive.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox22023404">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="22023404">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title22023404">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Web search engines for government documents, etc.
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content22023404">
          <div id="boxatt22023404" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link25483009">
              <a id="link_25483009" href="http://www.google.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25483009,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Cold War America', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25483009}); ">
               Google
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile5825087" class="profile_wrapper">
      </div>
      <div id="rightboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox22022589">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="22022589">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title22022589">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           How about citing source?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content22022589">
          <p>
           For tips on citing print and electronic sources in the Chicago style, visit Trexler Library's
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/research/citation-guides.html">
            <em>
             Citation Guides for Print and Electronic Resources
            </em>
           </a>
           . For a more complete guide to the Chicago style, visit Purdue University's
           <em>
            <a href="http://owl.english.purdue.edu/owl/resource/717/01/">
             Online Writing Lab
            </a>
           </em>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
           For automated citation, try the shareware
           <a href="http://www.zotero.org/">
            <em>
             Zotero
            </em>
           </a>
           . Here is a user
           <a href="https://www.zotero.org/support/">
            guide
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt22022589" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
